org.alljoyn.bus
Class AuthListener.CertificateRequest

Object
  AuthListener.AuthRequest
      AuthListener.CertificateRequest
Enclosing interface:
AuthListener
public static class AuthListener.CertificateRequest
extends AuthListener.AuthRequest

Authentication request for a chain of PEM-encoded X509 certificates.

Method Summary
 void setCertificateChain(String certificateChain)
          Sets a requested public key certificate chain.
 
Methods inherited from class Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

setCertificateChain

public void setCertificateChain(String certificateChain)
Sets a requested public key certificate chain. The certificate must be PEM encoded.

Parameters:
certificateChain - the certificate to chain to set
